data.text:
@TelepresenceLen @JesabelRaay That script was lacklustre and didn't do her any justice at all. 
Watch her in Ex-Machina and she's very enthralling and has good range.
@JesabelRaay This should’ve happened omg
@Uncharted7108 @JesabelRaay Vikander was awfully bland in Tomb Raider.
@JesabelRaay This looks amazing
@JesabelRaay No, she wasn't meant to be Black Widow or Captain Marvel, but she was meant to play Sue Storm
@JesabelRaay I like the idea of Emily Blunt.
@JesabelRaay She's  ms fantastic

@JesabelRaay When Marvel Studios do a Fantastic Four movie John Krasinski and Emily Blunt need to play Reed Richards and Sue Storm. Both have been close or rumoured to play characters in the MCU and both are interested to play the two F4 members.
@JesabelRaay Emily blunt is one of my favs
@JesabelRaay she'd*
@JesabelRaay I was never a fan of Brie Larson's casting.
@JesabelRaay @ChrisRa7en Wow that would have been perfect. She can definetely handle action movies. Like Edge of tomorrow proved it.
@JesabelRaay If Emily Blunt were to be a part of a superhero franchise, I'd rather her join DC tbh. However, I still think he'd be perfect as Sue Storm in the MCU.

@JesabelRaay Agreed. But i think things are changing, We are starting to see  more and more films with quote on quote older women in lead roles. So we are headed in the right direction at least in my humble opinion.
@JesabelRaay Agreed. But it may have been an age  thing. Brie Larson is 7 years younger then Emily. And i think Marvel was thinking long term.
@pardonater @JesabelRaay She seems like the type of coworker that would go to HR IF you said hi to her then go to back to HR IF you try ignoring her.

@JesabelRaay I think Alicia Vikander would've been a better option than Brie.
Personally, the female MCU characters don't interest me or offer much on their films apart from Scarlett Witch, the Wakandans and best female MCU character Peggy Carter
@JesabelRaay Nice list!!! For me, suspria, Wildlife, Beale Street, Vox Lux, and Widows... I'm counting the days!!!
@JesabelRaay Me too. I wanted to see Emily Blunt for it. But im always open to see what it will turn out to be like.
@JesabelRaay Whew yes. What are your most anticipated?!
@JesabelRaay Yeah i agree with u
@JesabelRaay She will do better than decent marvel knows how to cast

@JesabelRaay Ugh. I can't unsee that now. What could have been!

And yeah I understand that. My hype level for all CBMs rn is super low. It's probably bc of Oscar season lol.
@Father2Abby @JesabelRaay Second that.
@JesabelRaay I’m on the “Emily Blunt as Susan Richards” Train. I remember when they were casting Captain Marvel, I wanted Abbie Cornish to play her. But I’m sure Brie will do a spectacular job.

@JesabelRaay There's just something about Brie Larson I'm not a fan of and I can't quite figure out what it is. I mean I think Tremblay was the best actor in Room. Agreed on Emily Blunt. Surprised they didn't go for her esp as she's already in Poppins
@JesabelRaay Stahppppp . now I dont wanna watch the movie bc It's not Emily 😭😩

@JesabelRaay is it breaking the internet? So far Capernick/Nike is still the talk
anyway, i am more excited to see the world of #CaptainMarvel as the Nova Corps and Skrulls, etc.
@JesabelRaay damn that fan art looks so much better
